metadata.Description: Tidal power is a form of hydropower that converts the energy from the tides into electricity.

tidal power.Description: Tidal power implements Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
Tidal power funds Research and Development to explore new technologies and improve efficiency.
Tidal power focuses on Renewable Energy Sources to harness clean and sustainable energy.
Tidal power is included in the Energy Transition Plan to diversify the energy mix and reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
Tidal power partners with Ocean Conservation Organization to ensure minimal impact on marine ecosystems.
Tidal power contributes to Climate Change Mitigation by reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
Tidal power monitors power generation to optimize efficiency and performance.
Tidal power targets increased Renewable Energy Capacity to meet sustainability goals.
